messages.content: kya aap mujhe samajh sakte hain?
Hi. I am your assistant and I will provide expert full response in full details. Please feel free to ask any question and I will always answer it.
क्या आप मुझे समझ सकते हैं?
Mujhse aise hi baat karo jaise mai kar raha hu
Yes, I can understand you, I am an AI language model and I will understand your questions and respond to them.
